determineBestFeatureProcessorManager

public static FeatureProcessorManager determineBestFeatureProcessorManager(Voice voice)
For the given voice, return the best feature manager. That is either the voice-specific feature manager, if any, or the locale-specific feature manager, if any, or the language-specific feature manager, if any, or the fallback feature manager.

Parameters:
voice -
Returns:
a feature processor manager object. If this returns null, something is broken.

determineBestFeatureProcessorManager

public static FeatureProcessorManager determineBestFeatureProcessorManager(java.util.Locale locale)
For the given locale, return the best feature manager. That is either the locale-specific feature manager, if any, or the language-specific feature manager, if any, or the fallback feature manager.

Parameters:
locale -
Returns:
a feature processor manager object. If this returns null, something is broken.

getSupportedLocales

public static java.util.Collection<java.util.Locale> getSupportedLocales()

getTargetFeatureComputer

public static TargetFeatureComputer getTargetFeatureComputer(FeatureProcessorManager mgr,
                                                             java.lang.String features)
Obtain a TargetFeatureComputer that knows how to compute features for a Target using the given set of feature processor names. These names must be known to the given Feature processor manager.

Parameters:
mgr -
features - a String containing the names of the feature processors to use, separated by white space, and in the right order (byte-valued discrete feature processors first, then short-valued, then continuous). If features is null, use all available features processors.
Returns:
a target feature computer
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the features is not known to the manager

getTargetFeatureComputer

public static TargetFeatureComputer getTargetFeatureComputer(java.util.Locale locale,
                                                             java.lang.String features)
Convenience method for getting a suitable target feature computer for the given locale and list of features. A feature processor for the given locale is looked up using getFeatureProcessorManager(Locale) or, if that fails, using getFallbackFeatureProcessorManager().

Parameters:
locale -
features - a String containing the names of the feature processors to use, separated by white space, and in the right order (byte-valued discrete feature processors first, then short-valued, then continuous)
Returns:
a target feature computer
See Also:
getTargetFeatureComputer(FeatureProcessorManager, String)

getTargetFeatureComputer

public static TargetFeatureComputer getTargetFeatureComputer(Voice voice,
                                                             java.lang.String features)
Convenience method for getting a suitable target feature computer for the given voice and list of features. A feature processor for the given voice is looked up using getFeatureProcessorManager(Voice) or, if that fails, using getFeatureProcessorManager(Locale) using the voice locale or, if that also fails, using getFallbackFeatureProcessorManager().

Parameters:
locale -
features - a String containing the names of the feature processors to use, separated by white space, and in the right order (byte-valued discrete feature processors first, then short-valued, then continuous)
Returns:
a target feature computer
See Also:
getTargetFeatureComputer(FeatureProcessorManager, String)
